quoteEscaping.description: Fix unescaped quotes in JSON attributes
quoteEscaping.pattern: Replace single quotes with double quotes in block attributes

dimensionConversion.pattern: Keep dimensions as strings - WordPress expects "120px" format

cssFiltering.pattern: Remove position, z-index, display, and other unsupported CSS

borderSimplification.pattern: Convert nested border objects to flat properties or remove entirely

positionRemoval.description: Remove position styles that break WordPress validation

attributeFiltering.pattern: Remove gap, flexDirection, columns, isStackedOnMobile, listStyle, margin attributes

fontWeightNormalization.description: Convert font-weight values to WordPress standards

emptyContentHandling.description: Handle blocks without content that need closing tags
emptyContentHandling.pattern: WordPress auto-generates proper closing tags and inner content

cssClassGeneration.description: WordPress auto-generates CSS classes based on block attributes
cssClassGeneration.pattern: Border attributes generate has-custom-border class, color attributes generate has-text-color class

inlineStyleRestrictions.description: Inline styles vs block attributes placement rules
inlineStyleRestrictions.pattern: Padding should be in style object, not inline styles. FontSize in style.typography, not top-level

buttonAttributeStructure.description: Button block specific attribute structure requirements
buttonAttributeStructure.pattern: fontSize goes in style object, not root level. Use style.typography.fontSize

htmlCommentRemoval.description: HTML comments break block validation parsing
htmlCommentRemoval.pattern: Remove all HTML comments (<!-- text -->) from block content - cause parsing failures

templateVariableCleanup.description: Template variables break validation in test environment
templateVariableCleanup.pattern: Remove {{VARIABLE:default}} syntax for validation testing - use plain text

buttonFontSizeClasses.description: Button fontSize attribute generates specific CSS classes
buttonFontSizeClasses.pattern: fontSize="medium" must generate has-medium-font-size has-custom-font-size classes

missingCssClassGeneration.description: WordPress auto-generates CSS classes that must be expected
missingCssClassGeneration.pattern: Border styles → has-custom-border, has-border-color. Color styles → has-text-color. Custom font sizes → has-custom-font-size

duplicateParagraphTags.pattern:
WordPress generates extra paragraph wrapper causing

content

structure

mainContainerPaddingConflict.description: Main container padding causes inline style conflicts
mainContainerPaddingConflict.pattern: Remove padding from main container style attribute - WordPress expects padding:40px removed

sessionHistory.notes: Discovered position style removal pattern, refined CSS filtering accuracy
Discovered CSS class generation rules, inline style restrictions, button structure requirements from cart abandonment layout validation
